description:
As a leader in Bumble’s marketing org, you will have working relationships with and exposure to other senior and executive leadership across Bumble, Inc. You will also be responsible for building out a measurement framework to both quantify the impact and inform the brand team’s priorities across core focus areas: brand partnerships, loyalty programs, influencer and talent partnerships, and event and experiential activations. Develop and execute a yearly program of events, activations, and partnerships to drive Brand favorability and engagement. Ownership of projects, budget, and team (cross functional, Brand, or agency) support as needed. Use market insights, data, and knowledge of our product and the dating app sector to align Brand activities against core KPIs and OKRs, key audience segments, and company goals. Write strategy and create internal decks or reporting as necessary.

Bumble is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
